extendedInfo.description: Beautiful battery widget(2x1) with customizable interface (different colors) for standard Home Screen. It's not for aHome etc.To add widget press: Home->Menu->Add->Widgets->BatteryLifev1.3.3:-performance improvements-colors fixLook for our AppControl application manager and NEW ProcessManager.

reviews.comment: Love the exact battery. Great for when I\'m working I know my exact battery level. I wish you could be able to change good to low at a percent u want
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Has the most info presented VERY cleanly and efficiently. Excellent widget app! Most others are too simple to be of much use. (on HTC Incredible)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Samsung GS2
reviews.comment: Near perfect little widget. Looks great and has lots of colour customisation. Perhaps a couple more widget size varieties would make it perfect. Great work though! Recommended to the max.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: it says it is good when there is like 15% but otherwise ts cool make writing in the center.of the battery and itll be awesome it is nice looking
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fantastic widget.
reviews.comment: Would be cool when charging it would say charging, or have a cool charging animation. When I changed the typeface removed the edge of the green part of the battery.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great, cool features. Widget is nice, small but readable at 2x1, even with extra info displayed. Just wish it resized when you turn the phone.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: was 5 stars...
reviews.comment: Now you have to open and close back out of app to get the widget to display correct amount. PLEASE FIX! (Droid X)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Perfect battery app! Useful info, and love the customization options. Absolutely perfect!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Simple, looks cool, works great! Perfect app!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Love It !!! Been using this widget for over 4 years now, the color changing feature is cool, very stable. BEST BATTERY APP!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: More customizations would be cool, but works great. Accurate and looks good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Unable to edit preferences on Galaxy Nexus :(
reviews.comment: Screen is scaled incorrectly so I am unable to change settings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: OMFG!!!! This is for all you F\'in retards who keep on bitching about how it wont \'open\'...ITS NOT A APP! ITS A >>WIDGET<<!!!! Now stop saying it sucks
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Its a WIDGET, people! Long press on ur home screen> android widget> batterylife, or read own phones instructions. Works beautifully! Droid2
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Please fix!
reviews.comment: Upgraded my droid, but app doesnt work anymore. Please fix so i can use it again! Worked great before upgrade.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I LOVE this widget, but is there any way to make it not drain the battery in less than 6 hours on Eris? 5 stars then for sure.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Agree with Malorie, it works on my droid x 2.3, but it suddenly stopped auto updating. Now I have to click and close the widget to update.inconvenient
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Good app totally worth it, would be better if you could have the battery change colors based on battery percentage though..still 5 stars
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A 5* for Visual and custom colors,and text gives me info I need. A beautiful Widget! Larger size is nice to see when driving!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad
reviews.comment: Nice, but horizontal alignment of percentage number not center inside gray box. Please fix it:-)
reviews.author: A Google User
